00020 #ifndef CO_DATASTREAMARCHIVEEXCEPTION_H
00021 #define CO_DATASTREAMARCHIVEEXCEPTION_H
00022 
00023 #include <boost/lexical_cast.hpp>
00024 #include <boost/archive/archive_exception.hpp>
00025 
00026 
00027 namespace co
00028 {
00029 namespace serialization
00030 {
00031 // @internal flag for fp serialization
00032 const unsigned no_infnan = 64;
00033 }
00034 
00049 class DataStreamArchiveException : public boost::archive::archive_exception
00050 {
00051     std::string msg;
00052 
00053 public:
00055     DataStreamArchiveException(signed char invalid_size)
00056         : boost::archive::archive_exception(other_exception)
00057         , msg("requested integer size exceeds type size: ")
00058     {
00059         msg += boost::lexical_cast<std::string, int>(invalid_size);
00060     }
00061 
00063     DataStreamArchiveException()
00064         : boost::archive::archive_exception(other_exception)
00065         , msg("cannot read a negative number into an unsigned type")
00066     {
00067     }
00068 
00070     template <typename T>
00071     DataStreamArchiveException(const T& abnormal)
00072         : boost::archive::archive_exception(other_exception)
00073         , msg("serialization of illegal floating point value: ")
00074     {
00075         msg += boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(abnormal);
00076     }
00077 
00079     const char* what() const throw() { return msg.c_str(); }
00080     ~DataStreamArchiveException() throw() {}
00081 };
00082 
00083 }
00084 
00085 #endif //CO_DATAOSTREAMARCHIVE_H
